ROOM.NAME: MA Tavern
ROOM.DESC:
The MA Tavern is full of raucous warriors. - The war against Evil has been won, it's time the heroes return home 
          _
        _|_|_
        (o o)
    ooO--(_)--Ooo

ROOM.NAME: Your house
ROOM.DESC: Your house overlooks the Lamb and Lion pub, which makes it easy to stumble home when drunk.

ROOM.NAME: A shady alley
ROOM.DESC: The alley is dark with a peculiar mist making it hard to see the other side. You can hear someone whistling ♬ poorly.

ROOM.NAME: Castle
ROOM.DESC: The castle was built hundreds of years ago when the city was much richer than it is now.

ROOM.NAME: City walls
ROOM.DESC: The city walls are eight metres high and two thick, and have kept invaders out for centuries.

ROOM.NAME: Misty alley
ROOM.DESC: A dangerous-looking man stands before you holding a small dagger. "Come any closer and I kill yer!"

ROOM.NAME: Stables
ROOM.DESC: The stables are full of sleeping horses, but at least it is nice and warm in here.

ROOM.NAME: Gardens
ROOM.DESC: The gardens are peaceful and surprisingly of flowers for this time of year.

ROOM.NAME: The Pub
ROOM.DESC:
The pub is full of drunken revellers - brawling and shouting about killing orks

ROOM.NAME: Gates of HELL
ROOM.DESC: As you came closer, the gates of HELL became hotter and hotter

ROOM.NAME: Village of DOOM
ROOM.DESC: The Devils wandering in the village of DOOM look angry and beast-y
